====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-plot-soil-description-protocol-shapes:water-rill-erosion-degree:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils rill water erosion degrees codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils rill water erosion degrees codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/11173ac4-e240-592a-bdb9-df2aa88f908c[`Minor`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/bcb518f2-15ec-509e-8729-8fd6c12f031c[`Moderate`]
